revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - This is fine. META: update Berlin image link (https://berlpap.smb.museum/04379/); Hermopolis is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756574); Hermopolites is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756575). TEXT: many dots missing (double-check all these); there is no scribal diairesis in l.7; these are dots on the previous line’s letters; accent τοῖς and add space after final sigma in l.10
